response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving of $500 compared to the standard price. I believe this product will greatly enhance your experience and contribute positively to your endeavors. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know at your earliest convenience. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to serving you soon.", "product_price": 11500}
